description: This source file implements platform-dependent and utility functions for the TLS Hso Client in a TLS implementation. It provides a factory function for creating a TLS HsoClient object, specifically the TlsCreateHsoClient function, and includes license and module information.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsCreateHsoClient(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new TLS HsoClient object with provided context handles.
